website_summaries.verdict: Although these discs are a bit large, these freeze-dried quail discs last a long time, and they’re packed with healthy additives and quality raw meats.
pros: Fortified with vitamins, minerals, prebiotics, probiotics, enzymes, and more
cons: You have to break these down into a suitable size for your cat

customer_reviews.title: Hard to break into pieces
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, my cat and ferrets LOVE this... it gets 5 stars for quality and pets liking it! But I only gave it 3 stars because they're hard disks, and it's hard to break off any pieces, and to take a smaller piece and break it even smaller to make it bite-sized for cat or ferret is even more difficult... granted, I'm 60 and my hands dont have the strength they used to but even so... it's a consideration that needs to be taken into account. I won't be buying anymore because of this... but my animals sure love them when I can manage! I give them Optimize instead and they love that too!
customer_reviews.author: I Love Reading Romances

customer_reviews.title: At last somebody understands that cats need something to chew on
customer_reviews.text: My cats chew on everything. I have been looking for something that is good for them that they can chew on. They usually gulp everything down with out chewing. These are the size of a small cookie. They had to really work at getting them into a position to chew on. When they did figure it out it took them 20 minutes to get them to a point that they could chew on them. Totally recommend for cats that chew. Also good for cats that get bored easily. Mine do. They really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Catsagt

customer_reviews.title: None of my cats would even try this flavor.
customer_reviews.text: None of our cats will touch this flavor of Dream Treats (even our feral cats, who usually eat anything). The smell is also offensive, almost as if the product is spoiled. I tried soaking part of the wafer in water to make it more palatable. All the cats love the CHICKEN flavor, so I wish I had re-ordered that instead of trying Quail. Way too much money for such an unacceptable product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Not for ferrets good for cats/dogs
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for my ferret but when i got it and read the ingredients it's NOT good for ferrets AT ALL! Buyers beware! However my CATS LOVE IT!! There's a lot of fruits and vegetables in this product that's ferrets absolutely can not eat. They can't digest these things and can potentially kill them. So do not buy this for your ferret. For your cat or dog this is an amazing product that's why i gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Julinar Zara Al-Akshar

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure they're good just my guys don't like them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my ferrets. Drizzt is my male and he eats everything and he wouldn't touch them. Ash is my female and she looked at them sniffed them and shrugged them off. Maybe my little guys are just picky but they didn't seem interesting at all. I have been taking them and breaking them apart into tiny pieces and mixing them with my morning soup I make them. I use duck soup, the raw food from wysong and some kibble. They eat it but I don't think they know they're in there. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: These treats are amazing, my dogs and ferrets love them
customer_reviews.text: I have become a Wysong addict for my fur babies. The food is the best quality I have come across and these treats are no exception. They are about the size of the palm of your hand so you can break them into pieces or give them whole as a large treat. On the bag they even state you could use as a meal, which I have not yet tried. Great product and its on a reoccuring order :)
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: NOT DEHYDRATED MEAT chunks like in the Quai Nurture Kibble .
customer_reviews.text: Deceptive rip off... ! I bought at the OUTRAGEOUS asking price of over $55 a pound ( do the math) thinking they MUST be the same dehydrated quail chunks that are included in the Qail Kibble but they are NOT by a long shot! Although my kitty LOVES those dry meat chunks of quail in the kibble, she knocks these off the shelf to the floor..and says ' what is this crap?' ... They're only HALF quail, if that..for less than $50 a lb there are freeze dried turkey chunks from honeyville ranchers cut, good human eatin' too! Share w your kitty !
customer_reviews.author: Donkey Howdy

customer_reviews.title: A BIG hit!
customer_reviews.text: These treats are a huge hit in our house with our cat and our dog. They are easily broken into smaller pieces for our cat and the larger pieces are the perfect size for our small (18 lb) dog. There is no strong smell, and the pieces have stayed dry and edible in the package over time. We are completely satisfied with the product and are ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Busted VW

customer_reviews.title: Your pet will go nuts over these
customer_reviews.text: My cats and finicky chihuahua go absolutely nuts over these! My 16 year old cat moves in ways I haven't seen in years the second he hears the slightest crumple of the bag. It's all raw protein so it's been helpful keeping my older cats in normal weight range instead of losing weight.. As elderly cats do. Tip: I signed up to receive sample food wysong directly from their website and these were in there. This was one of the products I had to buy much much more of.
customer_reviews.author: cdolphin09

customer_reviews.title: Best Brand For Ferrets
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I trust the Wysong brand to provide my animals with the most healthy food available. The dog/cat likes them more than the ferret but he is stubborn. Will continue to buy and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KKlouzal

customer_reviews.title: I usually crumble them and sprinkle on top of wet food they may not like to eat on their own (too healthy I guess)
customer_reviews.text: My cats are addicted to this. I usually crumble them and sprinkle on top of wet food they may not like to eat on their own (too healthy I guess). They will also eat the on their own as treats, if broken up. The treats come as roughly 2inch diameter patties. They are clearly made for dogs however, breaking them apart works just fine for my cats. One issue I have, is since these are raw (freeze dried?), I am not sure whether I should store them in the fridge or room temperature.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product - Cats Won’t Eat
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered freeze dried rabbit for my cats for years from other brands, but they were unavailable this time so I decided to try this one out. The product was hard as hockey pucks, and had a smell to it that made me think it had possibly gone bad. I decided to see if my cats would eat it, but the turned their noses up at it. They love rabbit so much that they go bananas when I open a bag, so I knew there must’ve been a problem. I tried reaching out to customer service, but got no response, so I won’t ever order this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Summers Sisters

customer_reviews.title: The only cat treats we buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not into treats and has a very sensitive stomach. We stopped giving her treats for years because she would always puke. In comes Dream Treats. She will rub all over the cabinet begging for these things and she’s never puked them up once. Been buying them for years and can’t recommend them highly enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: 6 paws up in this house!
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my cats love these treats. I break them up into small pieces for a snack. I also crush them up and sprinkle a little bit over their regular food if one of my cats needs a little "incentive" to eat. It works like a charm with my 19 year old boy who can be a bit finicky some days. The rabbit flavor seems to be the only one all of my cats will eat.
customer_reviews.author: just jen

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my dog and ferret
customer_reviews.text: To address the flavor I'm not tasting one to see if they taste like rabbit so I'm not rating that, but both my dog and my ferret love them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Peterson

customer_reviews.title: It's a no from the ferrets, yes from the kitty
customer_reviews.text: I figured I'd give these a try with my ferrets as they love Instinct Raw Boost Mixers, so I thought maybe these would be better for them as I already have them on a Wysong food as well. Unfortunately my picky ferrets wouldn't touch em, but the cat loves em!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Picky Ferrets love them
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets are obsessed with the chicken flavor! One biscuit gets split between the three of them. I only feed Wysong products to my ferrets.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Seems good but he wont try it
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good treat but our ferret will not eat it
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: These are also great treats for ferrets!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful treats! My ferrets adore them. I break them into quarters and use them as treats. They are obligate carnivores, so this treat is not harmful like some others that are loaded with carbs. It's also a novel protein source, and I'm happy to add some quail to their diet. My ferties come running when I rattle the Dream Treats bag!
customer_reviews.author: Weaselpop

customer_reviews.title: Popular with the pups
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these!!! I'm excited about them too because using these as treats is a great way to introduce more exotic proteins into their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR FERRETS!
customer_reviews.text: There are a few ingredients in these that are BAD for ferrets! I would NOT reccomend these to then.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Ferret approved
customer_reviews.text: My two ferrets love these! One treat can feed both of them; they are pretty large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy choice
customer_reviews.text: Healthy choice to add variety to my cat's diet. She likes it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa G

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves these and goes craxy when she hears ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves these and goes craxy when she hears the bag. They are very expensive but i guess you pay for quality vs the instore junk
customer_reviews.author: Angelic

customer_reviews.title: Tho your wysong products such as wysong digestive support for ferrets is fantastic: ) These discs tho are very easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd be more impressed if there weren't so many veggies in it, as ferrets are obligated carnivores, so the blue berries, and carrots and spinach kind of threw me off after reading the ingredients. Tho your wysong products such as wysong digestive support for ferrets is fantastic :) These discs tho are very easy to break apart! Which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Ferretspazz

customer_reviews.title: My ferret likes this
customer_reviews.text: I crumble up a little over her wysong dry food and she loves it. I like that it doesn’t have any kind of plant material in it like cheaper treats do.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit Bark

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Every animal hated them. 5 ferrets none would touch, 3 cats not one would touch and one dog wouldn't touch. Threw one outside on side walk it sat for a week before it rained on it and it dissolved
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Our cav just turned 6 yrs old. He has ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cav just turned 6 yrs old. He has these daily. HE LUVS" these. Being a finicky eater there are some days these are subs for his regular meals. He was introduced to them by our Ragdoll cat when he was a puppy. That was our Ragdoll's daily treat. A bag came with the kitten from the breeder.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Green

customer_reviews.title: he loved these. When I got a new cat
customer_reviews.text: Recommened by my cats vet when he was sick, he loved these. When I got a new cat, these became a big treat for him. Dogs also love these.
customer_reviews.author: Julie L. Leber

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle a bit of this on wet food to get my picky cat to eat it. Love that it is raw and starch free
customer_reviews.author: Bianca ReaganTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them! Ferrets don’t.
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets didn’t like them, I think because of how dry they are, and how flaky it is when broken into smaller pieces. My dogs, however, adore this treat and gobble them down before asking for more! It’s healthy and yummy so I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Just A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Brand!
customer_reviews.text: Both my ferrets love these treats, I couldn’t find anything they would like. These are a keeper. They also eat and love there dry food.
customer_reviews.author: MIchelle Wixon

customer_reviews.title: "Teddy" loves Dream Treats!
customer_reviews.text: Our Maltipoo loves these, and I feel good offering them to him because they are made by Wysong.

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: great product, needs to be broken up for cats as it is the size of on oreo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ferret favorite
customer_reviews.text: My ferret loves these!!! I break them up into much smaller pieces than they come so the package lasts quite a while for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat for Cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this! I use it as a treat, or sometime break it up into smaller pieces and sprinkle it on their raw food....yummy to them. And I always feel good about feeding them Wysong treats because they're such good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Greenwald

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets want nothing to do with them,they seemed just dried out not dried freeze
customer_reviews.author: George B williams III

customer_reviews.title: Freeze dried raw
customer_reviews.text: Both my dog and kitty love these treats. They'll eat it dry or wet! I love Wysong!

customer_reviews.title: Treats
customer_reviews.text: Well my ferret loves it and he was extremely particular about what he eats.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets both love these, and their nutritious for them to.

customer_reviews.title: My ferret loves it
customer_reviews.text: Onlu complaint is that they are big biscuits, so I just break it up a bit.

customer_reviews.title: Serious Snackin
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My ferret loves it, as well as my Chihuahua! Plus, out of all the 3 flavors, Quail is the most nutritional. Also, this will last LONG due to being easily breakable into smaller pieces. Wysong knows how to do it. Even though on Amazon it’s a bit pricey-er, the Free Shipping makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We only feed wysong. If you read independent ratings this is one of the most reliable companies.

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets approve
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets love them. Much healthier than other ferret treats.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but your ferret may either love them or ignore them .
customer_reviews.text: My ferret didn't like them but my friends loved them !

customer_reviews.title: My picky minipoodle is recovering from a systemic yeast infection ...
customer_reviews.text: My picky minipoodle is recovering from a systemic yeast infection and must NOT have any sugar or grains. The Wysong Dream Treats are the only ones she is allowed - and she loves them all, but especially the Rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary in PA

customer_reviews.title: No works for my ferret
customer_reviews.text: Ferrets are pick eaters, and this treat didn't work for them. Mine didn't like at all!!! It is too expensive for a treat. I bought a food from this brand but very disappointed about the treat,
customer_reviews.author: Bianca V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nutritionally balanced treat for ferrets They are large
customer_reviews.text: Excellent nutritionally balanced treat for ferrets They are large, so I break them in half or quarters. Buddha, my ferret, Loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves to bite into these. I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves to bite into these. I thought they looked large for cat treats but she has never refused these, though she is sometimes indifferent to other treats. They seem reasonably nutritious, so go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Renard

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sized discs, which could easily be broken to share among three dogs.

customer_reviews.title: I like the natural treats and think it's overall better
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them, but that's not saying much since he eats everything. I like the natural treats and think it's overall better. It also helps compliment the raw diet my dog is on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Haag

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and delicious for your pet
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets love these and it's good to be able to offer them a healthy treat.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs AND kitty love these things
customer_reviews.text: My dogs AND kitty love these things. The baggy is small and there aren't too many treats in it so I break them into little bite size training treats and they will do ANYTHING for them :-)

customer_reviews.text: My dogs and cats like these. I got them for my dogs as a bedtime treat. One of my cats routinely steals one as I'm getting the dogs ready for bed.

customer_reviews.title: loved these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs, even the picky one, loved these treats. They can be easily broken into small pieces and lasted a long time.

customer_reviews.text: My ferret and cat both love this. Wysong is a great company with quality food.

customer_reviews.title: giant oreo-size treats are way too big for cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes these treats, but they're way too big for her. They're as big as an Oreo cookie. Seriously. No exaggeration. I have to crumble them up for my cat and the mess gets everywhere, including all over me. That's a problem because this is basically raw meat that I don't want all over my house. Sorry, Wysong, but you blew it. You need to make a tiny version of this for cats instead of making cat owners deal with this mess.

customer_reviews.title: Smell terrible...something is seriously wrong
customer_reviews.text: There was something seriously wrong with this batch. We’ve been buying these treats and our 2 ferrets are obsessed. Now they won’t touch them. There is such an offputting smell that I cannot blame them. We will be cancelling our subscription. They smell so bad that I’m not sure if I’m harming our two ferrets. Really disappointing.

product_meta.title: Wysong Dream Treats For Dogs/Cats/Ferrets - Raw Food - 4.9 Ounce Bag
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:QuailDream Treats are Starch-Free raw meat treats, uniquely processed without damaging heat using our Wysong True Non-Thermal, manufacturing technology. Each meaty disc is loaded with extra vitamins, minerals, prebiotics, probiotics, enzymes, powerful natural nutraceuticals and more! Developed by our own Dr. Wysong, manufactured in our own manufacturing facility. A truly beneficial dog, cat, or ferret treat (yes, it's a raw ferret food too)! Dream Treats natural dog and cat treats are great tasting, no-worry, no-guilt, snacking for the important companion animal in your life. The no-mess discs are easy to carry along for training treats and excellent to share any time. Serve every day to ensure an optimal supply of important nutrients and as a gift of love... real genetically appropriate natural food your pet dreams about
feature_bullets: Raw Meat Treats For Dogs And Cats, Uniquely Processed Without Damaging Heat Using Our Wysong True Non-Thermal, Manufacturing Technology

Not Heated Above 118 Degrees Fahrenheit. A True Non-Thermal Freeze-Dried Raw Product! Free Of “Fillers” -- Non-Nutritional Additives Used By Manufacturers To Create Color, Texture, Stool Consistency, Or Shelf-Life
No-Worry, No-Guilt, Snacking For The Important Companion Animal In Your Life. No-Mess Discs Are Easy To Carry Along For Training Treats And Excellent To Share Any Time
Contains Meats, Plant Nutrients, Nutraceuticals, Prebiotics, Probiotics, Vitamins, Minerals And An Array Of Micronutrients. High In Natural Protein And Fat Content
Wysong Has Been A Leader In Pet Nutrition Since 1979

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
